title: Deadlier... than the male
description: ‘DEADLIER... than the male’ is set in and around Mansfield in the heart of Sherwood Forest, England and takes the reader into a dark and dangerous world where Werewolves not only exist, but exist alongside humans – undetectable until just before the human becomes the victim.Werewolves do exist and they exist alongside our society, they have their own rules and hierarchy, they hide in plain sight and have done for millennia.This is a Werewolf tale with real BITE - Twilight for grown-ups!Sometimes, the female of the species is Deadlier... than the male.
author: D. Michelle Gent
